name: Natural Ruby Gemstone
description: Authentic AAA grade natural ruby gemstone for Sun (Surya) in Vedic astrology. Enhances confidence, leadership, vitality, and courage. Carefully selected and energized. Weight: 3-5 carats. Comes with authenticity certificate.

name: Blue Sapphire (Neelam)
description: Genuine premium blue sapphire for Saturn (Shani). Brings discipline, focus, removes obstacles, and promotes spiritual growth. Ideal for Saturn remedies. Weight: 4-6 carats. Lab certified for authenticity.

name: Pearl (Moti)
description: Natural South Sea pearl for Moon (Chandra). Promotes emotional balance, mental peace, and intuitive abilities. Perfect for Moon-related astrological remedies. Size: 6-8mm. Lustrous quality guaranteed.

name: Rose Quartz Crystal
description: Genuine rose quartz healing crystal for love and emotional healing. Promotes self-love, compassion, and harmony in relationships. Ideal for heart chakra activation. Size: 2-3 inches. Naturally formed.

name: Clear Quartz Crystal
description: Master healer clear quartz crystal for energy amplification and mental clarity. Enhances meditation, spiritual growth, and positive energy flow. Perfect for all chakras. Premium quality, naturally formed.

name: 5 Mukhi Rudraksha
description: Sacred 5-faced Rudraksha bead representing Lord Shiva. Brings peace, protection, and spiritual growth. Ideal for health, wealth, and overall well-being. Lab tested for authenticity. Size: 18-20mm.

name: 7 Mukhi Rudraksha
description: Powerful 7-faced Rudraksha representing Goddess Lakshmi. Brings wealth, prosperity, and removes financial obstacles. Ideal for business success and abundance. Authentic and energized. Size: 16-18mm.

name: Shree Yantra
description: Sacred Shree Yantra in pure copper for wealth and prosperity. Hand-engraved with precise geometric patterns. Attracts abundance, success, and positive energy. Size: 3x3 inches. Includes worship instructions.

name: Ganesha Yantra
description: Powerful Ganesha Yantra for removing obstacles and bringing success. Made in pure copper with authentic mantras. Ideal for new beginnings and career growth. Size: 3x3 inches. Energized and blessed.
